title: Welcome on PixWorld
text: Place pixels where you want on this canvas !
controls:
Controls

Pixels:
  Select colors in the palette right of the screen
  KeyMiddleMouseButton or KeyLeftCtrl or KeyLongTap to select color of hovered pixel
  KeyLeftClick or KeyTap to place a pixel
  KeyLeftShift to place pixels while moving the mouse
  KeyRightShift to place pixels from historical mode while moving the mouse

Moving:
  KeyW KeyA KeyS KeyD  or  Key↑ Key← Key↓ Key→  or  KeyDragMouse  or  KeyTouchPan  to move
  KeyScrollMouseWheel  or  KeyQ KeyE  or  KeyTouchPinch to zoom

Settings:
  KeyG to toggle grid
  KeyX to toggle pixel activity
  KeyH to toggle historical mode
  KeyO to toggle overlay
  KeyL to set zoom to 1:1 pixel size ratio
  KeyM to toggle mute
  KeyB to open bookmarks menu
  KeyC to copy cursor coordinates
  KeyU to activate auto brush mode
  KeySHIFT+C to copy current position as URL
rules:
Rules

  - No hate symbols or other offensive stuff (Especially swastikas)
  - No bots except in the Oceans and Antarctica (Otherwise, you'll be IP banned if we see you and you'd have to explain yourselves)
  - No proxies
  - No extreme NSFW stuff (Breasts are fine, closeup of genitals or sex is not)
  - No extreme NSFL stuff (A bit of blood is fine, but no detailed gore)
  - Keep the in-game and Discord chats clean (No Racism, Homophobia, Insults, Harassment, etc...)
  - Don't doxx anyone (No leaking personal information)
  - No excessive grief or raids on communities
